## TemitClient.close() method

Closes this instance's AMQP connection if it's active.

Currently this is always a cold close and will interrupt consumers and publishers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
close(): Promise<this>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;this&gt;
